expo.name: MuscleHunter2
expo.description: Welcome to Muscle Hunter. An application made to make people aware of the benefits of resistance training regarding cardiovascular diseases and diabetes especially. The app is supposed to a solution. A cheap alternative to the fitness centers, and a substitution to the casual run a lot of people has as their only active habits. We hope that you like the app but we are open for feedback so feel free to reach out.
